info.name: Facebook Stuff - Hide Right Column
info.description:
Hides the right column on Facebook that contains the Sponsored, Sponsored Stories, Ticker, online friends list, and events sections.

I use Adblock Plus so you don't actually see the ads in the screen shot
info.additionalInfo:
1/6/2012
Added #pagelet_ego_pane

If you notice any right hand column items not being hidden, please contact me through a PM or Ken Saunders -at- AccessFirefox .org
Thanks
